casebody.data:
Jennings, Appellee, v. B.O.C. Group, General Motors Corporation, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Jennings v. B.O.C. Group, General Motors Corp. (1990), 48 Ohio St. 3d 5.]

(No. 89-625 Submitted November 8, 1989 Decided January 3, 1990.) Schiavoni & Schiavoni and Joseph J. Bush III, for appellee. Baughman & Associates Co., L.P.A., and Leonard J. Pappas, for appellant. Stewart Jaffy & Associates Co., L.P.A., and Stewart R. Jaffy, urging affirmance for amici curiae, Ohio AFL-CIO and Ohio Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The judgment of the Court of Appeals for Trumbull County is affirmed on authority of Schell v. Globe Trucking, Inc. (1990), 48 Ohio St. 3d 1, 548 N.E 2d 920.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Fain, JJ., concur. Mike Fain, J., of the Second Appellate District, sitting for Resnick, J.
